Member Function Documentation

void StarCatalog::findNearbyStars ( double  ,
double  ,
double  ,
std::list< Star > &   
)

Produces a vector of stars that fall within a specified radius of a specified ra+dec coordinate.

Also figures out the position of each star in tangential cartesian coordinates, relative to the center position for easy plotting.

Parameters:
raright ascension where the camera is pointing
decdeclination where the camera is pointing
rradius (in degrees) around which to look for stars (should be FOV of camera)
nearbystarsempty vector of Stars which will be filled up with the results
Todo:
: check that this ra and dec from the tracking computer are already precessed, or from j2000 or something. If not already precessed, they need to be.
